item.title: Directory Listing to Account Takeover
item.description: Directory listing is one of the most common misconfigurations which can be exploited trivially. However, the impact depends on the criticality of the files present inside the directory. Recently, during one of my pentests, I came across an interesting open directory which I was able to leverage. On enumerating, I discovered a subdomain which was the staging server and was accessible over the internet. [nishaanthguna:~/essentials]$ curl --silent https://crt.sh/\?q\=%.domain.com | sed 's/<\/\?
